description: From a series of four etchings for the story "Der Rebell" by Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918; man upside down and falling with arms to his side and right hand and fingers extended
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: Probedruck. / I. Zustand | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.122-I | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2399
portfolio: From Plate 4 from Der Rebell (The Rebel), Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18.
title: The Fall into Infinity, Plate 4 from Der Rebell (The Rebel)
